Module.Name: Single value non-dietary exposures
Module.Description: Single value non-dietary exposures are based on the single value concentrations or amounts of substances, in contrast to the distribution-based exposures of individuals in the non-dietary exposure module. Exposures are via any of the non-dietary routes: dermal, inhalation, or oral. Depending on the exposure type, single value non-dietary exposures can be short-term/acute or long term/chronic exposures. The exposures can be modelled as external exposures or internal exposures.
Module.DataDescription: Single-value non-dietary exposures estimates are collected in exposure scenarios.
Module.ShortDescription: Single value non-dietary exposures are based on the single value concentrations or amounts of substances. Exposures are via any of the non-dietary routes: dermal, inhalation, or oral.
Module.CalculationDescription: Single value non-dietary exposures are calculated from single value exposure values.
